unnormalised: Organic farming, eh? My grandfather in Kerala swore by it, way back in '60s! No fancy chemicals then. Just good ol' cow dung & neem leaves. Heard IARI is doing some cool research on this now. Hope they can scale it up! Maybe less pesticide wali sabzi for everyone by 2024! Used to visit the kisan mandi at 10:00 am every Sunday to get organic stuff, before the prices shot up after 23/01/2023. It felt so much fresher!
normalised: organic farming eh My grandfather in Kerala swore by it way back in nineteen sixties No fancy chemicals then Just good old cow dung and neem leaves Heard I A R I is doing some cool research on this now Hope they can scale it up Maybe less pesticide wali sabzi for everyone by two thousand and twenty four Used to visit the kisan mandi at ten a m every Sunday to get organic stuff before the prices shot up after twenty third january two thousand and twenty three It felt so much fresher
